home.heroDescription: Create beautiful online Gender Reveal moments that you can share with friends and family anywhere in the world.
home.featureCreateDescription: Enter information such as mother's name, father's name, baby name, and gender.
home.featureAnimationDescription: Choose from various beautiful Gender Reveal animations and add a countdown.
home.featureShareDescription: Get a secure link that you can share with friends and family on social media.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Share Your Special Moment?
home.ctaDescription: Create a Gender Reveal in minutes and share the exciting moment with friends and family around the world.

create.title: Create Gender Reveal
create.subtitle: Enter the information below to specially announce your {{boyText}} or {{girlText}} news
create.cardDescription: Enter family information and choose an animation. You can also enter multiple birth information such as twins, triplets, etc.
create.privacyNotice: The information entered is not collected or stored.

form.step1Description: Please fill in all the information below
form.step2Description: Please select the animation to use for your Gender Reveal
form.babyNameDescription: Please enter your baby's nickname or pet name
form.isMultipleDescription: Select if multiple births such as twins, triplets, etc.
form.babyInfoDescription: Please enter each baby's name and gender. All baby names are required.

success.copyFailedDescription: Please manually select and copy the link.

link.title: Gender Reveal Link
link.expirationDescription: The generated link will be valid for up to {{days}} days{{date}}.
link.expirationWarning: Access to expired links may be difficult, so please share in advance.
link.shareDescription: Share this link to reveal your Gender Reveal to family and friends.

animations.confettiDesc: Colorful confetti explosion revealing the gender
animations.balloonsDesc: Blue or pink balloons filling the screen
animations.fallingDesc: Blue or pink baby items falling from above

footer.description: Create precious Gender Reveal moments that you can share with your loved ones.
footer.madeWithLove: Made with love for expecting parents

examples.title: Gender Reveal Examples
examples.subtitle: Check out examples created by other parents and get inspired. These examples showcase various animations and styles.
examples.ctaDescription: Create your own special Gender Reveal in just a few minutes and share this exciting moment with your beloved family and friends anywhere in the world.
examples.metaTitle: Gender Reveal Examples - Animated Gender Reveal Previews
examples.metaDescription: Explore various Gender Reveal animation examples and get inspired for your special moment. Preview different styles and animations.

socialShare.title: Share Gender Reveal
socialShare.description: Share this special news with your family and friends

messages.multipleBabies: You're invited to {{motherName}} and {{fatherName}}'s Gender Reveal party! Come find out {{babiesText}}'s genders together! ðŸŽ‰

error.invalidToken: Token is invalid or missing. Please check the URL and try again.
error.decodeFailed: Unable to decode reveal data. The link may have expired or been modified.
error.loadFailed: An error occurred while loading reveal data.

intro.startRevealMultiple: ðŸŽ‰ Reveal Our Babies' Gender ðŸŽŠ
intro.processDescSingle: Click the reveal button to start the countdown, followed by a special animation revealing baby {{babyName}}'s gender.
intro.processDescMultiple: Click the reveal button to start the countdown, followed by special animations revealing each of the {{count}} babies' genders in sequence.

results.createOwnQuestion: Want to create your own Gender Reveal?

reveal.metaTitle: Gender Reveal - Discover Your Baby's Gender
reveal.metaDescription: Share this special moment together and discover your baby's gender. Experience the true surprise!
